name: GameJam 2020
description:
This year’s game jam was around the word island.  

As a lost samurai you must use your spell book to fight off hordes of zombies, ever increasing as the rounds keep on coming. You must decide what spell you will use to kill the undead evil, allowing it to upgrade the more you use it.  

Use the powers of:

Fireball – A basic single target projectile that does a small amount of damage

Lightning – A cone ability that will hit all the targets close to you

Healing Mist – Using the powers given to you, trade your mana for health to keep you going.

Atomic Bomb – Hold the projectile down to send it off, release to then explode the damaging projectile killing anyone in the explosive area.  

Ice Bolt – Another single target ability, faster, more damage, but make sure you do not miss as it costs more mana than fireball.

Rock Throw – As the name suggests, throw an arcing ability towards the enemy dealing a large amount of damage, I wonder how many rocks you will be able to throw if you upgrade this one.
